events.message: I am filing a claim regarding the car accident I was involved in last night at the intersection downtown.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and details provided by the customer.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the auto accident claim and will contact the customer shortly.
We have received your claim regarding the vehicle accident and are starting the processing procedure.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and the repair estimate for further assessment.
The customer submitted all requested documents including police report and photographic evidence of the collision.
Investigation into the car accident and liability issues has commenced based on the submitted evidence.
The investigation into the vehicle accident is complete and fault has been assigned to the other party.
A settlement proposal has been drafted based on damages assessed and repair costs estimated.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed gratitude for the timely handling.
The insurance claim for the auto accident has been officially approved after review of all documents and investigation outcome.
Payment for the approved claim was issued promptly to cover the damages to the vehicle.
The auto accident claim case has been successfully closed following full settlement and payment.
All records related to this vehicle accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance.
